entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 4.
